var urls = [	
	"https://ebook.longmabook.com/",
	"https://www.longmabookcn.com/",
	"https://ebook.lmbooks.com/",
	"https://www.lmebooks.com/",

	"https://www.urhtbooks.com/",
	"https://www.newhtbook.com/",
	"https://www.lvhtebook.com/",
	"https://jp.lvhtebook.com/",

	"https://www.htnewbooks.com/",
	"https://www.lmbooks.com/",
	"https://www.haitangbook.com/",
	"https://www.mybookinlm.com/"
]

function getUrl(_) {
  const { java, source } =_|| this
  let v = String(source.getVariable())
  if(v.length < 1){
    source.setVariable("0")
    v = v.match(/^\d+$/) ? v : 0
  }
  return urls[v]
}

function getIndex(a){
	let i=urls.indexOf(a)+1
	return i
	}

body='paperid='+paperid+'&vercodechk='+code;
option={
"method":"POST",
"body":String(body)
}
